name: sydai
description: SydAI - AI-powered application with authentication and services

scripts.deploy: echo 'Deploy command - add your deployment logic here'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:server
scripts.build:server: echo 'Server is Node.js - no build needed'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../database && npm install && cd ../ai_services && npm install
